replies.body:
wow someone was mean to you on the internet, did it hurt your feelings?
honestly who actually gives a fuck. I'd rather have someone that's abusive as all hell but can still play the game than some shitter who's 0/5 at 8 mins
If it's not directed at me then it's directed to someone else. Also it still means i've encountered harassment.
well that sucks man these days half of the games im in no one talks you know
I'd rather no communication some games than the asses I get sometimes.

Dude, I havent got a GGWP all back for about 3 months, I have said it so many times. Either people sooking about how OP our team was or someone blaming the ADC that never had help. I dunno man, I think im playing with spoiled children 9/10 times

Yeah, every time a player joins Riot puts them into a Galton Box system called the Quincunx matrix. Here a few select players are chosen to always play with toxic players, that way the rest of the community can enjoy peaceful, relatively non-toxic games. Looks like you're a Quincunx player, thanks for clearing the rift up for me. 

also kappa
so thats why i need to /mute all nearly every game
if you do that, then its not your teams fault you loose games
don't lose, they just die once then go toxic as (i'll leave that to your imagination), then they all start to fight, so i mute them all and just split push and backdoor for rest of game
how do they not know this? and why would they ask like they're assuming its NOT a big problem already.....
